React.createClass vs extends React.Component

Poll results from Twitter

React.createComponent and extends React.Component give us the same results. The ability to create React components.

I’m starting a new project, and wanted to set a standard in the way I create components. I was interested to see who uses React.createComponent or extends React.Component.

How do you create your #react components? @reactjs @londonreact @React_Tutorial

— David Boyne (@boyney123) April 21, 2016

Looks like the majority of people that answered are using extends React.Component.

I done some deeper diving into why and found some links that might help you decide:

Composing Components

Choose extends React.Component

I decided to use extends React.Component due to the fact it looks like Facebook might be dropping it at some point (although that was over a year ago…). Thanks to @Rhodesy for pointing this out.
